summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4476 for the improvement of North and West 35th Street, from a point 200 feet west of Evanston Avenue to West Canal Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52670, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
